title: A Simple Request.
body: I've come to tell about my current 123RP and how hextech chests cost 125RP. Wanted to know if anyone could just throw in that 2RP for me. Sorry to take your time and thanks for reading this. Hopefully I will see the change soon. KingZarzei (OCE)

replies.body:
You can submit an art to Player Support for the chance to get that small amount of RP. Be aware though that this is a one time deal, and there is no obligation for Support to fulfil it.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

You can see what some other people have sent in the past here :)
http://rpart.riotgames.com/na/en/
